1) CAT


About: Common Admission Test for pursuing MBA in IIMs and other non IIM Institutes.

 Eligibility : Should have a degree with 50% marks or 45% for other community (Even Final year students can take the test.)

 Pattern : Around 100 questions, every correct answer gains 4 marks whereas every wrong answer results in one negative mark.

 Syllabus : Quants verbal di logical reasoning

2) ATMA(Aims Test for Management Admissions)


Level: National Level

 Eligibility: Should be bachelorâ€™s degree holder

 Age limit: 21

 Syllabus: Analytical, Verbal(RC,SC, Synonyms,Antonyms) and Quants Skills

3) CMAT : Common Management Admission Test


Pattern : 4 sections each 25 questions

 Syllabus: Quants and DI,Logical,LAnuage Comprehension,General Awareness

4) GMAT


Eligibility: AGE 18+ and No exact educational qualifications

 Skill set reqd: Analytical Writing Ability(AWA), Quants-problem solving and data sufficiency Verbal

5) IBS Aptitude Test


Eligibility: Should have bachelor degree + Should have 50% mark and English as medium of communication. (IF not English then you should submit TOEFL ,IELTS scores)

 Syllabus: Verbal Quants ,RC,DI

 Pattern: Each sections 30 questions

 Followed by GD and PI for selected students

6)IIFT exam


Eligibility: Degree holder Final year can apply NO age limit

 Pattern: Written Test and essay writing followed by GD and PI

 Syllabus: Verbal (RC),GK and awareness, Logical, Quants.

7) TANCET


About: MBA,MCA in Tamil Nadu

 Syllabus: Verbal DI Quants and Logical, Computer Awareness.

 Pattern: 100marks correct : + 1mark wrong : -1/3.
